mapper.select: select A.id,A.article_id,B.title,A.user_id,A.content,A.update_time from `blog_comment_first` as A,`blog_body` as B where A.deleted = 0 and A.article_id = B.id limit 5

SELECT A.id,A.user_id,B.`name`,A.content,C.id as body_id,C.content_id as article_id ,C.title FROM `blog_comment_first` as A,`user_info` as B,`blog_body` as C where A.user_id = B.id and A.article_id = C.id and A.deleted = 0 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT A.id,A.user_id,B.`name`,A.content FROM `blog_comment_second` as A,`user_info` as B where A.user_id = B.id and A.first_id = #{id} and A.deleted = 0 ORDER BY id DESC
